mapper.select: select com_code , emp_no , enroll_date , start_time , end_time , work_time , com_status from commute where emp_no = #{empNo} and enroll_date = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') FROM DUAL)
mapper.insert: insert all into commute (COM_CODE , emp_no , ENROLL_DATE , START_TIME , END_TIME , COM_STATUS) values (SEQ_COMNO.nextval , emp_no , to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') , null , null , 'AB') select emp_no from employee where employee.ent_yn = 'N'
mapper.select: select vac_recode , emp_no , vac_days , enroll_date , vac_reason , vac_divide , vac_category from vac_recode where emp_no = #{empNo}
select app_no , vac_kind , vac_start , vac_end , half_status , vac_use , half_day from vac_form v join approval a using (app_no) where a.emp_no = #{empNo} and a.form_code = 3
